faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q5: Is it easy to implement Host Helper AI?
faq.a5: Yes, implementation is very simple. Our team will guide you through the entire process and you will have your AI agents up and running in less than 24 hours.
faq.a6: We offer a free personalized demonstration where you can see how the AI agents work with your own data and specific use cases.
faq.a2: Yes, you can upgrade or change your plan at any time on a prorated basis.
faq.q3: In which languages is the assistant available?
faq.a3: The assistant is available in multiple languages, with the ability to automatically detect the guest's language and respond appropriately in their native language.
faq.q4: How does the extra income system work?
faq.a4: The assistant proactively offers additional services to your guests, such as transfers, show tickets, or restaurant reservations, generating commissions for you.
faq.a7: All plans include email technical support. Pro and Enterprise plans also include priority support and access to a dedicated account manager.

ctaSection.title: Ready to revolutionize your accommodation management?
ctaSection.subtitle: Start saving time and increasing your income with Host Helper AI today

meta.title: Upselling and Commissions - Host Helper AI
meta.description: Generate additional income by recommending relevant services and experiences to your guests, enhancing their stay while increasing your profitability.

hero.title: Upselling and Commissions
hero.subtitle: Increase Your Revenue
hero.description: Generate additional income by recommending relevant services and experiences to your guests, enhancing their stay while increasing your profitability.

passiveIncome.title: Passive Income
passiveIncome.description: Earn commissions for each service contracted through your recommendations, creating an additional income stream without extra effort.

betterExperience.title: Better Experience
betterExperience.description: Your guests value personalized recommendations, which improves their overall experience and increases positive ratings.

totalControl.title: Total Control
totalControl.description: Access detailed reports on generated commissions, most popular services, and conversion rates to optimize your strategies.

features.title: Features and Possibilities
features.subtitle: Our upselling system is designed to maximize your additional income while providing real value to your guests with relevant recommendations.
features.description: Our upselling system is designed to maximize your additional income while providing real value to your guests with relevant recommendations.

utmLinks.title: Personalized UTM Links
utmLinks.description: Automatically generate tracking links for each recommendation, allowing precise tracking of conversions and commissions.

smartRecommendations.title: Smart Recommendations
smartRecommendations.description: The system analyzes your guests' preferences and behaviors to offer personalized, high-conversion suggestions.

localIntegration.title: Local Provider Integration
localIntegration.description: Connect with high-quality services in your area: from tours and activities to transfers and dining services.

dashboard.title: Commission Dashboard
dashboard.description: Visualize your commission income in real time, with detailed reports by service type, season, and properties.

testimonial1.description: Charming rural accommodation in Sierra de Gata, Extremadura.
testimonial1.text: Host Helper has transformed our reservation management. Guests are delighted with 24/7 attention and we save time answering repetitive questions.
testimonial1.author: María González

testimonial2.description: Holiday home in the authentic Spanish village of Ojen, Andalusia, with mountain views and close to the beach.
testimonial2.text: Host Helper AI has been essential for managing Casa María Flora from the Netherlands. A perfect solution for international property owners!
testimonial2.author: Elske Lena

testimonial3.description: Boutique accommodation in the historic center of Lucena.
testimonial3.text: The additional services sales feature has allowed us to increase our income by 30%. Guests really appreciate the ease of requesting extra services.
testimonial3.author: Lola Martínez

testimonial1.text: Host Helper AI has transformed our guest experience. The AI responses are so human-like and helpful that our guests consistently rate their communication experience as excellent.

testimonial2.text: We've saved over 20 hours per week since implementing Host Helper AI. The system handles everything from check-in instructions to local recommendations automatically.

properties.title: Your Properties
properties.subtitle: Manage all your properties from here

form.autoCoverImageText: The first image you upload in the next tab will automatically become the property's cover image.
form.businessLinksDescription: Add links to your business profiles (Instagram, Facebook, website, Google Business, etc.). Our AI Agent will share these links when guests have positive experiences to help boost your online presence.
form.businessLinksDescriptionPlaceholder: Describe your business links strategy or any specific instructions for your AI Agent...
form.shareableLinksNote: These links will be strategically shared by our AI Agent to help promote your business when guests have positive experiences.

additionalImages.title: Additional Images
additionalImages.description: Add images with descriptions to show tourists visual information about the property. Images should be accompanied by clear context so our AI agent knows when to show them to tourists (e.g., "View from the terrace" or "Oven instructions").

documents.title: Property Documents
documents.description: Add documents such as guides, instructions, house rules or FAQs to answer guests' frequently asked questions. These documents will be used by our AI Agent to provide accurate and personalized answers to tourists.

types.faqDescription: Answers to common questions about the property, area or services
types.guidesDescription: Instructions for using appliances, wifi, TV, etc.
types.houseRulesDescription: Specific rules that guests must follow
types.inventoryDescription: List of available objects and equipment

documents.pendingDescription: The following documents are being processed:

hints.googleBusiness: Our AI agents will automatically send this link to satisfied guests to get positive reviews

features.title: Main Features
features.subtitle: Everything you need to efficiently manage your tourist accommodations
features.chatbotDesc: AI agents for guests that resolve queries in real time
features.checkInDesc: Automate traveler registration and document verification. Save time and avoid documentation issues.
features.upsellingDesc: Generate additional income by offering complementary services at the right time. Transfers, local activities, late check-out and more.

promoVideo.title: How does it work?
promoVideo.subtitle: Create your AI agents in minutes, no technical knowledge required

step1.title: 1. Register and add your property
step1.description: Create your account in minutes and add the details of your property. Upload photos, description and accommodation rules.

step2.title: 2. Configure your AI agents
step2.description: Customize chatbot responses, accommodation information and additional services you want to offer.

step3.title: 3. Share the phone number with your guests
step3.description: Provide our AI agents' phone number to your guests. Our agent takes care of everything with complete access to property information and reservation details.

cta.title: Join property owners who are automating their management
cta.subtitle: Save time, increase your income and improve guest satisfaction.

meta.title: Intelligent AI Agents - Host Helper AI
meta.description: 24/7 phone support for your accommodations with intelligent AI agents that handle calls, coordinate with maintenance teams, and provide personalized recommendations to your guests.

hero.title: Intelligent AI Agents
hero.subtitle: 24/7 Phone Support for Your Accommodations
hero.description: Our AI agents handle phone calls 24 hours a day, manage incidents in real time and coordinate with maintenance or cleaning teams. Integrated with WhatsApp and Telegram to send multimedia information, locations and links. When they need help, they collaborate with each other or escalate to your human team.

phoneService.title: Intelligent Phone Support
phoneService.description: Your guests call a phone number and have voice conversations with our AI agents. Available 24 hours, they understand multiple languages and resolve queries instantly.

multichannel.title: WhatsApp & Telegram Integrated
multichannel.description: During calls, agents send images, locations, links and documents via WhatsApp or Telegram. They combine voice conversation with multimedia content instantly.

teamwork.title: Intelligent Teamwork
teamwork.description: When an agent cannot resolve something, it collaborates with other specialist agents or escalates to your human team. They can coordinate with maintenance or cleaning teams during the same call.

features.title: Capabilities of Our AI Agents
features.subtitle: Reduce your workload while your guests receive professional attention 24 hours a day.

multilingual.title: Natural Multilingual Conversation
multilingual.description: They converse by voice like humans in Spanish, English, French, German and more languages. They understand accents and context to provide accurate responses.

maintenanceCoordination.title: Coordination with Maintenance Teams
maintenanceCoordination.description: During the call with the guest, they can simultaneously contact plumbers, electricians or cleaning teams. They coordinate appointments and confirm with the guest in real time.

intelligentEscalation.title: Intelligent Escalation
intelligentEscalation.description: When they cannot resolve something, they collaborate with specialist agents or transfer the call to your team with full conversation context.

personalizedRecommendations.title: Personalized Recommendations
personalizedRecommendations.description: They know your area perfectly and send restaurant photos, location maps, booking links and personalized recommendations via WhatsApp based on guest preferences.

demo.subtitle: Real Practical Case
demo.title: Example: Plumbing Issue
demo.description: Discover how our AI agents resolve real incidents step by step, coordinating with maintenance teams during the same guest call.

step1.title: Guest calls:
step1.description: No hot water in the apartment

step2.title: Diagnosis and escalation:
step2.description: The agent understands the problem and unable to resolve it transfers the call to a specialist agent who contacts the plumber directly

step3.title: Specialized coordination:
step3.description: The specialist agent explains the breakdown to the plumber with all details and schedules the repair appointment

step4.title: Guest confirmation:
step4.description: The plumber will arrive tomorrow at 10:00. I'm sending you their details via WhatsApp

meta.title: Check-in Automation - Host Helper AI
meta.description: Automate traveler registration according to Spanish regulations (SES) and optimize the check-in process, saving time for your guests and reducing your administrative burden.

hero.title: Check-in Automation
hero.subtitle: Benefits of Automated Registration
hero.description: Simplify traveler registration according to Spanish regulations (SES) and optimize the check-in process, saving time for your guests and reducing your administrative burden.

compliance.title: Legal Compliance
compliance.description: Automatically comply with Spanish traveler registration regulations (SES) without worries or risk of penalties for non-compliance.

timeSaving.title: Time Saving
timeSaving.description: Reduce management time by up to 90%. The registration process that used to take hours is now completed in minutes without your intervention.

experience.title: Better Experience
experience.description: Provide your guests with a modern and smooth digital experience that they can complete before arrival, facilitating a hassle-free check-in.

features.title: Features and Capabilities
features.subtitle: Our check-in automation system is specifically designed to comply with Spanish regulations and optimize the management of tourist accommodations.
features.description: Our check-in automation system is specifically designed to comply with Spanish regulations and optimize the management of tourist accommodations.

sesIntegration.title: SES Integration
sesIntegration.description: Direct connection with the Interior Ministry's SES system, ensuring compliance with Spanish traveler registration regulations.

customForms.title: Customizable Forms
customForms.description: Adapt registration forms to your brand and style, including all mandatory fields according to current regulations.

documentCapture.title: Document Capture
documentCapture.description: Allows guests to securely upload photographs of their identity documents before arrival.

reservationManagement.title: Reservation Management
reservationManagement.description: Manual creation or automatic import of reservations from Airbnb, Booking and other platforms, keeping all data synchronized.

demo.subtitle: See in action
demo.title: Simplified Check-in Process
demo.description: Our system automates the entire traveler registration process, from data collection to SES submission, saving you time and avoiding errors.

capabilities.dataCollection: Automatic data collection from reservations on Airbnb, Booking and other platforms
capabilities.links: Sending personalized links to guests to complete their registration
capabilities.validation: Automatic validation of data and identity documents
capabilities.transmission: Secure and direct transmission of information to the SES system
